title: Table Query
description: This schema defines type of table query

userName.description: Name of the user that executed the SQL query

startTime.description: Start time of execution of SQL query

endTime.description: End time of execution of SQL query

analysisDate.description: Date of execution of SQL query

aborted.description: Flag to check if query was aborted during execution

serviceName.description: Name that identifies this database service.

database.description: Database of the associated with query

databaseSchema.description: Database schema of the associated with query
